segments.text: I think the biggest environment problem in my country is air pollution .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I agree . The air here is much more polluted than in my country . Of course , my country is more agricultural and has much less industry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have reduced emission of air pollutants in recent years , but cars are still a major source of them . Factories have become cleaner as stricter environment pollution law have been introduced .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The problem is now on a truly global scale . I don't believe that any single country can do anything about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you're right . There needs to be an international response to this problem ?
segments.speaker: S1
